title: (x) Cosmic Design Gallery - Coolvetica {Yves}
content:
![cosmicdesign](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518124315im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/28987.jpg)   
   
I want the font where is it written "cosmic design gallery"
author: fallen_angel

comments.content: Except for the 'y' it looks like Helvetica. The 'y' could have been made from the g and the u.
no, the "y" have not been made from the "g" and the "u", but coolvetica matchs pretty close, thank you
